Getting Started with GreenData Platform
You get started with the GreenData platform - a universal tool for creating IT systems of any complexity that help manage data and automate business processes.
With GreenData, you can focus on solving business problems and, without technical obstacles, get a ready-made solution.
Advantages of GreenData
GreenData provides advanced functionality that allows to:
create solutions
without special technical development and programming skills;
reduce development time and costs
- the platform has all the necessary tools for developing different types of applications without the need for additional installation and purchase of components;
automate routine operations
, reducing the number of errors and speeding up processes;
adapt and scale applications
depending on the growth and needs of the business - making changes to business processes and adding new data sources is possible at any stage without affecting the efficiency and stability of your applications;
manage access securely and reliably
- detailed access management and role model configuration will ensure the protection of confidential information;
For secure storage of sensitive data, GreenData uses the Hashicorp Vault tool.
To ensure reliable operation of the platform, regular system vulnerability scanning according to common OWASP standards and dependency updates are built into the development process.
minimize risks and dependence on foreign IT solution providers
— GreenData complies with the requirements of the Russian Ministry of Digital Development, is included in the Unified Register of Russian Software, and does not depend on foreign components, DBMS, or OS.
Features
GreenData is a flexible and universal platform with extensive functionality that includes many modules:
Gradually, you will learn to effectively apply all the platform’s tools, but for now, get acquainted with the purpose of the main modules:
You can read a brief description of the functionality you will start working with in each of the main modules in
"First setup steps"
.
The
"Data Model"
module allows organizing structures for storing and further processing of data. In the future, the created object model will become the basis for the business process model.
Modeling with a focus on the essence of the business task, without being distracted by technical design problems.
Working with business entities, not database tables - without involving SQL specialists for implementation.
Data entry is performed through visuals configured according to the needs and requirements of the user.
The
"Business Rules"
module allows setting business logic for any action and at any stage.
Defining data processing rules, calculations, business process logic, and interface properties by configuring business rules and algorithms.
Using a simplified business language, developed on the basis of groovy, which allows operating with any attributes of the object model created by the user, with logical and loop operators, defining variables, and any other constructions for working with data typical for most programming languages.
Business rules and algorithms are configured with an intuitive algorithm editor with a rich set of functions.
Algorithms and business rules can be launched on events and on a schedule.
The system allows using data for complex calculations and analysis, it is possible to use neural networks and machine learning, and, if necessary, to use Python in calculations.
The
"Screen Forms"
module helps adapt the interface using intuitive constructors.
Ability to customize the appearance of all elements of the finished application in accordance with the corporate style of the company and user requirements.
Ability to fully customize the user interface for the tasks of a specific user or different groups of users.
Setting up the structure of forms for different types of data: lists, cards, registries using a convenient constructor with Drag&Drop.
Ability to personalize the login and registration page in the application.
The
"Business Processes"
module allows organizing interaction and work of performers according to business process rules in BPMN2.0 notation.
Business processes are integrated with the object model, so you can work with data without wasting time on transformations.
Exceptional flexibility of the online business process model allows adjusting business rules "on the fly" without stopping activity.
A single information management space for managing multiple performers, work rules, and regulations is available.
The
"Role Model"
module allows configuring transparent and manageable access to data and operations, ensuring security and ease of use for all categories of users.
Creating role groups from scratch or based on organizational-role matrices.
Ability to add complex access rules considering powers related to objects and operations.
Simple and visual role configuration in a graphical interface.
Quick creation of role groups from scratch or based on existing matrices.
Clear separation of user permissions for performing operations with documents, tasks, processes, and other platform objects.
Ability to configure access permissions at the level of objects, operations, or entire data groups.
Support for precise role distribution among employees to control task execution.
The functionality of the
"Analytics and Reporting"
module collects data in a form convenient for analysis, providing a visual representation of data and business charts.
Automatic data collection for reporting.
Building reports interactively - reports are formed based on changed data.
Dashboards and rich graphics allow displaying data in the form of tables, charts, graphs, and diagrams.
The
"Integrations"
module toolkit allows loading, importing, and transforming data from various sources.
Extraction and transformation of data in ETL integration is configured in a constructor, not programmed by developers.
The logic of working with data is configured in data processing and transformation schemes, which resemble business process schemes.
Heterogeneous data sources are supported - you can extract data from objects, files, documents, external resources, DBMS.
The
"Complex Calculations"
module capabilities allow setting up and performing complex calculations to solve any business problems, including using machine learning tools.
Setting up arbitrary calculations is done with the algorithm editor built into the platform.
Combining calculations into complex methods is applied in case of calculation hierarchies, multi-stage and batch calculations.
The ability to run calculations on a schedule allows initiating and performing calculations on events and timers.
The
"Electronic Documents"
module allows generating documents from user templates with substitution of any data contained in the application.
Online work with documents similar to Google Docs.
Full interactivity of documents ensures automatic updating when source data is edited.
Collaborative work with the document, possibility of approval and formation of disagreement protocols.
The
"Mobile and Desktop Applications"
module is intended for organizing work with the application, communication, and data transfer through integrated services and applications.
A set of corporate messengers working in an integrated way is implemented for convenience.
Native mobile applications are available for iOS and Android.
Online conferences can be organized by creating a meeting in the browser using the GreenData Meet service.
